IPL98 Global C++ only constants and template functions.

Modules

  • IPL98 Constants (global)
  • IPL98 Template functions (global)

Functions

  • istream & operator<< (bool b, istream &s)
    Streaming operator for a bool on an istream.

  • bool SplitFileName (const char *pFilePathName, string &Path, string &FileNameExt, string &Ext)
    Splits a file name including path given in "FilePathName" into a path (returned in "Path") and a filename including extension (returned in "FileNameExt") and an extension (returned in "Ext").

  • bool ConvertBackslashToSlash (char *Path)
    Converts all back slash characters '\' to slash '/'.

  • bool ConvertBackslashToSlash (string &Path)
    Same as ConvertBackslashToSlash(char* Path), except argument is type string.

  • bool AddTrailingSlashToPath (string &Path)
    Adds a trailing '/' character to the path if not present.

  • void SkipSpaceAndComments (istream &s)
    used for in streams.

  • void ToUpperCase (string &str)
    Converts all characters in str to upper case by calling std::toupper(char*) on each element in str.

  • int CompareNoCase (const string &s, const string &s2)
    Compares two strings case insensitive.

Function Documentation

bool ipl::AddTrailingSlashToPath (  string &    Path ) 
 

Adds a trailing '/' character to the path if not present.

Returns :
False, if Path is an empty string.
Version:
0.8

Definition at line 85 of file ipl98_general_functions.cpp.

int ipl::CompareNoCase (  const string &    s,
const string &    s2
) 
 

Compares two strings case insensitive.

Return values are like the ANSI cmp function: -1 if s<s2, 0 if s==s2 or 1 if s>s2.

Definition at line 94 of file ipl98_general_functions.cpp.

bool ipl::ConvertBackslashToSlash (  char *    Path ) 
 

Converts all back slash characters '\' to slash '/'.

Used to avoid problems with C++ reading a '\' path seperation as an escape character.

Parameters:
Path  Path to be converted, resultint string returned in this parameter.
Version:
0.8

Definition at line 60 of file ipl98_general_functions.cpp.

Referenced by ipl::ConvertBackslashToSlash().

istream & ipl::operator<< (  bool    b,
istream &    s
) 
 

Streaming operator for a bool on an istream.

The way IPL98 classes are built, we need this functionality for types used in the template based container classes such as CArray2D and CArrayOS2D. This may be changed later!

Version:
0.1
Author:
Rene Dencker Eriksen (edr@mip.sdu.dk)

Definition at line 28 of file ipl98_general_functions.cpp.

void SkipSpaceAndComments (  istream &    s )  [inline]
 

used for in streams.

Skips all whitespace, newline, tab characters and comment lines, i.e. rest of line from a '#' character.

Version:
0.8

Definition at line 159 of file ipl98_general_functions.h.

bool ipl::SplitFileName (  const char *    pFilePathName,
string &    Path,
string &    FileNameExt,
string &    Ext
) 
 

Splits a file name including path given in "FilePathName" into a path (returned in "Path") and a filename including extension (returned in "FileNameExt") and an extension (returned in "Ext").

Returns :
False in these cases: FilePathName==NULL or it is an empty string (produce an error message) FilePathName ends with the character '/' or '\' (produce an error message)

Definition at line 34 of file ipl98_general_functions.cpp.
